imdb.title: Lupin Zero
imdb.plot: In 1960s Japan, a thief's rebellious grandson and a gun-toting delinquent meet for the first time, forging a friendship that will one day achieve global infamy.

episodes.title: Young Lupin Meets a Wolf
episodes.plot: Teenage Arsène Lupin III meets Jigen for the first time in an epic encounter. However, the boys aren't fast friends when they're caught in a caper with a lady twice their age.

episodes.title: Hang Tight to the Treasure on the Train
episodes.plot: Jigen gets a job to guard treasure being transported on a train. Lupin gets on that train too, but what is it he really wants?

episodes.title: The Grandchildren Vie for Heirs
episodes.plot: Lupin joins a tournament set up his grandfather, the legendary thief Arsene Lupin, which if he wins he will receive his great inheritance.

episodes.title: Aim for the Whiskey Pipe
episodes.plot: Lupin must lay low. He decides to build a secret base for Jigen and himself at school, however, making a hideout is more complicated than he expected.

episodes.title: The Man Who Secretly Dances
episodes.plot: Around Christmas, Lupin III meets a strange tattooed man. Meanwhile, a weapon has been stolen from a US military base by Lupin II.

episodes.title: Young Lupin Claims the Title of the Third
episodes.plot: With only a few days left until the atomic bomb launches, the revolutionary Gaucho receives the first warning letter from Lupin the Third.
